The pistol used by the late Sir Sean Connery in the first ever James Bond movie - the 1962 classic Dr. No  has sold at auction for $256,000 (£190,000).

articles.title: Prince Harry mistaken for Christmas tree salesmen while shopping with Meghan Markle - Mirror Online
articles.description: A little boy ran up to Prince Harry believing him to work at a pop-up Christmas tree store near to duke's £11 million mansion in Santa Barbara - while a staff member described him as a "chill lad"
articles.content:
